code:
stateDiagram-v2
    %% L++ State Diagram: L++ Blueprint Registry
    [Infra_Cluster] --> idle
    idle --> ready : INIT
    idle --> ready : LOAD
    ready --> ready : LOAD
    ready --> ready : REGISTER [Infra_Worker]
    ready --> ready : UPDATE [Infra_Ingress]
    viewing --> viewing : UPDATE [Infra_Cache]
    ready --> viewing : GET [Infra_Worker]
    viewing --> viewing : GET
    ready --> searching : LIST [Infra_Cluster]
    ready --> searching : SEARCH [Infra_LoadBalancer]
    searching --> searching : SEARCH
    searching --> viewing : SELECT [Infra_Ingress]
    viewing --> viewing : VERSIONS [Infra_Ingress]
    viewing --> comparing : COMPARE [Infra_LoadBalancer]
    comparing --> comparing : COMPARE
    viewing --> viewing : ROLLBACK [Infra_LoadBalancer]
    viewing --> viewing : DEPS [Infra_Cluster]
    viewing --> viewing : CHECK_DEPS [Infra_Ingress]
    viewing --> viewing : DEPRECATE [Infra_Ingress]
    viewing --> ready : DELETE [Infra_Worker]
    ready --> ready : DELETE [Infra_Cluster]
    ready --> ready : EXPORT [Infra_Cluster]
    viewing --> viewing : EXPORT
    ready --> ready : STATS [Infra_Ingress]
    viewing --> ready : BACK
    searching --> ready : BACK
    comparing --> viewing : BACK

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们来设计一下这个流程，首先需要一个开始节点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我们需要确保这个逻辑是正确的。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 相较于方案A，Generic Diagram有更好的性能。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 最终，我们在Generic Diagram完成整个流程。
